messages.title: A message from Chris Jordan
messages.content: Imagine a government that cares about the environment, doesn't lock up without charge or trial, thinks that education should be free, as should healthcare, and does something about corporate tax avoidance. That's Green - that's different.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Restore the public sector, nationalise utilities and railways, and increase the minimum wage.
End university tuition fees and fund schools fairly.
Build affordable zero carbon homes, create a living rent and end exploitative letting fees.
End privatisation of the NHS, give mental health parity of esteem, and integrate health and social care.
Universal basic income to ensure nobody fears poverty.

mentions.candidate: Vote for Chris Jordan. Your Green Party Candidate

issues.economy: Restore the public sector, nationalise utilities and railways, and increase the minimum wage.
issues.education: End university tuition fees and fund schools fairly.
issues.health: End privatisation of the NHS, give mental health parity of esteem, and integrate health and social care.
issues.socialWelfare: Universal basic income to ensure nobody fears poverty.

housing.content: Build affordable zero carbon homes, create a living rent and end exploitative letting fees.

leaflet.personalStatement: A message from Chris Jordan: Imagine a government that cares about the environment...

Chris Jordan Green Party For the Common Good
